title: tokyohd
author: tokyohd
content: As reported by Collin Wu, an Ethereum mining machine manufacturer Innosilicon has released ETC firmware for A10pro 500M and A10pro 720M servers, which can be used for ETC mining. The ETC firmware for the A11 is currently under development.Read full details on U.Today https://u.today/ethereum-mining-firm-launches-etc-mining-software-weekly-etc-price-surges-54

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Hehe so miners are now switching to ETC since they can no longer take huge profits from POW mining ETH. Not a bad move for the manufacturer in answering the request of customers. Too bad I'm late to the news but I may take another look at ETC once the dumpers are done taking profits.

comments.author: Ulven
comments.body: In fact, miners are always looking for the benefit if their revenue from mining does not suit them, this makes them move to mining another currency because it is the most profitable and suitable for the prosperity of their company, so the news always comes late.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: That was a preparation that already made since a long time ago. Ethereum merged will come very soon and those miners have no chance other than migrated into the another blockchain. You must take a look at the price is still very stable and steadily going up. So, i didn't even think it will be going down again since miners will be also pumping it very soon. The impact from ethereum is real.
